name: Street Diver
description:
Play the newest Flip game!

Jump from an amazing variety of locations, from your regular day town to the tension of the Wild West or the amazing sci-fi World, there are tons of levels to explore! Land on specific targets, perform amazing frontflips and backflips to get more points and get rewarded for crashing!

EXPLORE OUR SAGA MAP
• Complete levels, earn stars and progress through our saga map
• Jump from amazing settings: From the Viking world to a city in space, the universe is your playground!

SHARE YOUR FUNNIEST MOMENTS
• Get rewarded for crashing!
• Share your best jumps and your hilarious fails with your friends!
Our ragdoll physics engine will make sure to provide you memorable moments!

TONS OF CUSTOMISATION AND CHARACTERS TO UNLOCK
• Unlock unique characters: Rockstars, sportsman, zombies, mummies, warriors.. Over 50 characters for you to unlock!
• Mix and Match body parts and create your unique character!
• New content delivered regularly!

----------------------------------------

This game does not require internet connection, and can be played offline.
